description:
When your intensity heats up, this headband will keep you cool. The moisture managing fabric keeps sweat out of your eyes and the antimicrobial treatment means you can wear it more and wash it less. The tapered end lets you change up your look.

  • CoolNet® fabric has sweat activated cooling to keep your head from overheating
  • UPF 50+ sun protection blocks 98% of UV rays
  • HeiQ Smart Temp antimicrobial treatment resists odour buildup
  • Interior silicone dots hold it in place
name: Buff CoolNet UV Ellipse Headband - Unisex
